Name: Wiccan
Description: Believing himself to be one of the Scarlet Witch's twin boys, Billy Kaplan also has reality-altering powers and is a member of the Young Avengers.
FirstComicDescription: The First Appearance of Hulkling and Wiccan!  A mysterious group of young heroes have appeared in the wake of great tragedy. Who are these teenaged do-gooders and what right do they have to call themselves the Young Avengers?!
